column5: Cannon cancelled my order for a Cannon clamp-on rod holder.  I still see some on their site; but they are priced at over $300.  I do see a reasonably priced on on the https://www.fishntech.com/site.  It looks legit; but I am hoping someone who has dealt with them can confirm.   https://www.fishntech.com/cn_single_axis.html
I've ordered items from them, had no issues.
I've order from them out of Quebec lots of good stuff no issues.
Fishntec is a great store to deal with. They also know what they are talking about with almost all of the products they carry.

X4,  I ordered from them this year to pick up an attachment for my trolling motor to cut the weeds(ninja grass cutter).  I found the product in the US, of course but these guys were the Canadian dealers that how I found the site.  No issues.  I used credit rather than pay pal.  They send it out in mail and it was lot cheaper than paying US exchange rates.

why not go through amazon?  https://www.amazon.ca/Cannon-Adjustable-Holder-Single-Axis/dp/B001M5TFQ2/ref=sr_1_5?s=sports&ie=UTF8&qid=1498535620&sr=1-5&keywords=cannon Because they don't have the clamp-ons for under $300.
I use them a lot, got my JJ's from them!
